  1. org.springframework.test.web.servlet.assertj

Uses of Package
org.springframework.test.web.servlet.assertj

Packages that use org.springframework.test.web.servlet.assertj
Package
Description
org.springframework.test.web.servlet.assertj
AssertJ support for MockMvc.
org.springframework.test.web.servlet.client.assertj
AssertJ support for RestTestClient.
  • Classes in org.springframework.test.web.servlet.assertj used by org.springframework.test.web.servlet.assertj
    Class
    Description
    AbstractHttpServletRequestAssert
    Base AssertJ assertions that can be applied to an HttpServletRequest.
    AbstractHttpServletResponseAssert
    Base AssertJ assertions that can be applied to any object that provides an HttpServletResponse.
    AbstractMockHttpServletRequestAssert
    AssertJ assertions that can be applied to MockHttpServletRequest.
    AbstractMockHttpServletResponseAssert
    Extension of AbstractHttpServletResponseAssert for MockHttpServletResponse.
    CookieMapAssert
    AssertJ assertions that can be applied to cookies.
    HandlerResultAssert
    AssertJ assertions that can be applied to a handler or handler method.
    MockMvcTester
    MockMvcTester provides support for testing Spring MVC applications with MockMvc for server request handling using AssertJ.
    MockMvcTester.MockMultipartMvcRequestBuilder
    A builder for MockMultipartHttpServletRequest that supports AssertJ.
    MockMvcTester.MockMvcRequestBuilder
    A builder for MockHttpServletRequest that supports AssertJ.
    ModelAssert
    AssertJ assertions that can be applied to a model.
    MvcTestResult
    Provides the result of an executed request using MockMvcTester that is meant to be used with assertThat.
    MvcTestResultAssert
    AssertJ assertions that can be applied to MvcTestResult.
  • Classes in org.springframework.test.web.servlet.assertj used by org.springframework.test.web.servlet.client.assertj
    Class
    Description
    CookieMapAssert
    AssertJ assertions that can be applied to cookies.
